messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. You are in Starbucks and you find a magic coffee bean with which you can teleport to any room only once. From Starbucks, what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify groups of connected stores and their reward value
- Group 1 (5 stores): Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora
- Group 2 (5 stores): Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
- Group 3 (5 stores): Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Nike
- Group 4 (5 stores): Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Target
- Group 5 (4 stores): Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
- Group 6 (4 stores): Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Target
- Group 7 (3 stores): Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara
- Group 8 (2 stores): Nike, Bath and Body Works
- Group 9 (3 stores): Levis, GNC Live Well, Target
- Group 10 (2 stores): H&M, Zara
- Group 11 (2 stores): Sephora, Bath and Body Works
- Group 12 (2 stores): GNC Live Well, Target

Step 2: Determine the optimal path from Starbucks
Since we are starting from Starbucks and can only teleport once, we need to choose a group that yields the highest reward and is connected to Starbucks.

The highest reward group connected to Starbucks is Group 1 (5 stores).

Step 3: List store names in order
Answer: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora
